summary: Clean save is required. read the description page.
descriptionHtml:
people are craving for merge version, so here you go.

make a clean save. say goodbye to your followers. uninstall the mod. load your game. save. reinstall the mod.
i use 7sevenbase, so you better choice 7base in your installation. after that don't check the original esps. install mine and activate from your fav mod manager.

this will be taken down when the original author made her/his own merge version.

requires:
Yamato Nadeshiko Followers - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52056/?

Utilities i use:
Merge Plugins TES5Edit Script by matortheeternal
TES5Edit by ElminsterAU

credits:
ria0417 - Yamato Nadeshiko Followers
matortheeternal - Merge Plugins TES5Edit Script
Sharlikran/ElminsterAU - TES5Edit
author: kullashaker
